Luther Whitney, ladro professionista, si introduce nella residenza di Walter Sullivan, un anziano filantropo considerato uno degli uomini piÃƒÂ¹ ricchi e potenti degli Stati Uniti, per svuotargli il caveau..............................

[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img202/6180/4e6.gif[/img]

Based on the novel by David Baldacci, Absolute Power is about the ruthlessness of people in power. The President believes that everything he does is beyond reproach, including an affair or two. That leads to murder and everyone around him is involved...................
